bibl.title: "Aristotle" and the Role of Doxography in the Anonymus Londiniensis .

bibl.author: MANETTI, Daniella

bibl.note: P. lit. Lond. 165 (= Pack2 2339; Marganne 102). - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 72 (2003) No. 214.
bibl.seg: MANETTI Daniella, "Aristotle" and the Role of Doxography in the Anonymus Londiniensis (PBrLibr Inv. 137).
